# tf.get_variable_scope

``` python
tf.get_variable_scope()
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/ops/variable_scope.py`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.12/tensorflow/python/ops/variable_scope.py).

Returns the current variable scope.
